00029 #ifndef __GLES2Support_H__
00030 #define __GLES2Support_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgreGLES2Prerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreRenderWindow.h"
00034 #include "OgreConfigOptionMap.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre
00037 {
00038     class GLES2RenderSystem;
00039 
00040     class _OgreGLES2Export GLES2Support
00041     {
00042         public:
00043             GLES2Support() { }
00044             virtual ~GLES2Support() { }
00045 
00051             virtual void addConfig() = 0;
00052             virtual void setConfigOption(const String &name, const String &value);
00053 
00058             virtual String validateConfig() = 0;
00059             virtual ConfigOptionMap& getConfigOptions(void);
00060             virtual RenderWindow* createWindow(bool autoCreateWindow,
00061                                                GLES2RenderSystem *renderSystem,
00062                                                const String& windowTitle) = 0;
00063 
00065             virtual RenderWindow* newWindow(const String &name,
00066                                             unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00067                                             bool fullScreen,
00068                                             const NameValuePairList *miscParams = 0) = 0;
00069 
00073             const String& getGLVendor(void) const
00074             {
00075                 return mVendor;
00076             }
00077 
00081             const String& getGLVersion(void) const
00082             {
00083                 return mVersion;
00084             }
00085 
00089             const String& getShaderCachePath(void) const
00090             {
00091                 return mShaderCachePath;
00092             }
00093 
00097             const String& getShaderLibraryPath(void) const
00098             {
00099                 return mShaderLibraryPath;
00100             }
00101 
00105             void setShaderCachePath(String path)
00106             {
00107                 mShaderCachePath = path;
00108             }
00109 
00113             void setShaderLibraryPath(String path)
00114             {
00115                 mShaderLibraryPath = path;
00116             }
00117 
00121             virtual void *getProcAddress(const String& procname) = 0;
00122 
00126             virtual void initialiseExtensions();
00127 
00131             virtual bool checkExtension(const String& ext) const;
00132 
00134             virtual unsigned int getDisplayMonitorCount() const
00135             {
00136                 return 1;
00137             }
00138 
00142             virtual void start() = 0;
00146             virtual void stop() = 0;
00147 
00148         private:
00149             String mVersion;
00150             String mVendor;
00151             String mShaderCachePath;
00152             String mShaderLibraryPath;
00153 
00154         protected:
00155             // Stored options
00156             ConfigOptionMap mOptions;
00157 
00158             // This contains the complete list of supported extensions
00159             set<String>::type extensionList;
00160     };
